Belligerence

  1. If I flip a blue hybrid battle icon, does it become an orange hybrid battle icon with the same trait? [Source: WotC]
    Yes.
  2. CUSTOM CARD
    Does the bot mode ability on     Motormaster still trigger when my opponent reveals an End Hostilities? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    No, it would be unable to trigger cause your oranges would be blues so your attack will not meet the flipped icons requirement. Note: Your own Belligerence would also cause the ability to fail.
  3. CUSTOM CARD
    What happens if my opponent plays a Belligerence, I reveal DaD, and I flip a     Matrix of Leadership and Master of Metallikato on defense? [Source: Alpha Trion Protocols]
    Belligerence would turn this flip of normally [OU, (OUB)] to [OO, (OOB)], meaning that you only flipped 2 colors on defense--Orange and Black, regardless of your characterâ€™s tratis--and would thus get +2 DEF for that battle.
